attributes.description:
New Arrival Coming @ Bidvest McCarthy Silverlakes.

2018 Kia Sportage 2.0 Ignite with 16500kms.
Test drives at your door, depending on your location. All vehicles come with certificates from Dekra. 

Trade-Ins are welcome. Delivery to your door. 

Finance Requirements: 
1. Copy of ID 
2. Copy of Driver’s License 
3. Proof of Address 
4. 3 Months Bank Statements & 3 Months Payslips.

Price excluding License and Registration as well as Delivery Fee and is subject to your location. 
Contact *Mac from Bidvest McCarthy Isuzu, we are based in Pretoria Silverlakes. 

Contact Mac @Bidvest on 0645472149 ( Call or WhatsApp)

We do assist with finance and deliver countrywide to make your experience as effortless as possible. All trade inn’s welcome. Optional Mechanical warranties and service plans also available for your peace of mind. 

Price excludes Administration, Delivery & Registration costs. 

Become part of the Car City Secunda family!!
